pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, November 18, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario  

8:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will welcome His Majesty King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Mackenzie Tower Entrance
West Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity

8:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with His Majesty King Abdullah II of Jordan.

Office of the Prime Minister
West Block
Parliament Hill
 

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
  • Media are asked to gather in the 3rd floor foyer no later than 8:30 a.m.
